source: Dumbledore bowed his head. Professor McGonagall gasped. Lillian James! I can't believe it! I didn't want to believe it! Oh, Albus! Dumbledore reached out and patted her on the shoulder. I know, I know, he said heavily.
target:
Dumbledore bowed his head. Professor McGonagall gasped.  
“Lily and James…I can’t believe it…I didn’t want to believe it…Oh, Albus…”  
Dumbledore reached out and patted her on the shoulder. “I know…I know…” he said heavily.
